### Welcome to the RStudio Professional Quickstart!

The RStudio Professional Quickstart runs in a virtual machine and comes with RStudio Professional products pre-installed and pre-configured to make it easy for you try them out on your own machine.

### Products

[RStudio Connect](rsconnect/)

[Webmail](webmail/)

### Terms of Use

The Quickstart is primarily intended as a demo environment and is **not** supported for use in any production capacity. If you'd like to install and use RStudio Professional in production on your own enterprise infrastructure, please contact sales@rstudio.com.
